Description: Green glazed composition shabti of the God's Father and God's Servant of the Lady of the Sycamore, Wahibreemakhet, born of Bastetirdis, with a plain tripartite wig, plaited (?) long beard, arms crossed holding two hoes in relief, seed-bag over left shoulder, uninscribed back-pillar and bordered vertical series of hieroglyphs down front lower half.
Curator's comments: The collection contains a second shabti of the same man (EA 9135).
Acquisition name: Donated by: Lt-Gen Augustus W H Meyrick
